@graph.name: Address Book and Territories Planning - Unified Location Management - Route4Me
@graph.description: Streamline operations with a centralized address book and visual territory planning. Prevent costly mistakes with Route4Me's integrated platform for customer locations, service areas, and delivery zones.
@graph.keywords: route optimization, territory management, address book, customer location management, service territories, delivery zones, field service mapping, sales territory planning, location data management, route planning, territory visualization, CRM integration, delivery scheduling, location filtering, territory optimization

@graph.name: Address Book and Territories Planning for Field Operations
@graph.description: A business can only thrive when there is consistent information across the board regarding the locations of customers, depots, facilities, warehouses and any other real-world locations with which you interact. When copies of the same data are stored in multiple places, the data changes overtime, then one day a representative of your business arrives at a customer's outdated address, which can be a costly mistake. Route4Me provides a failsafe platform for our customers to manage their Address Book and Territories. Our Address Book and Address Book Map are online tools that permit you to view all of your customers, locations, territories and zones on a single visual map. You can create filters, search by attribute, set delivery schedules and even plan routes directly from the Address Book. The Address Book also works seamlessly with our Territory Management Add-On. You can view the number of your addresses from your Address Book in each territory in the Territory Counts section. Rolling your cursor over a territory in this section will display the exact address count for that territory. You can also download all addresses and contact information in a specific territory as a CSV file.

@graph.name: Start Managing Your Territories
@graph.description: Contact our team to learn how Address Book and Territories Planning can streamline your field operations

@graph.name: Location Management Features
@graph.value: Address book, visual map interface, filters, attribute search, delivery scheduling

@graph.name: Territory Management Capabilities
@graph.value: Territory counts, address counts per territory, CSV export

@graph.name: Integration Options
@graph.value: Route planning from address book, Territory Management Add-On

@graph.name: Business Benefits
@graph.value: Prevent costly address errors, consistent location data
